justification: "The primary task participants completed was a social distancing task … Participants placed an avatar of themselves to indicate the closest distance they would be willing to position themselves from another person …"

measured_by: Aggregate belief score from self-report items about protection from catching and spreading COVID-19
justification: "Belief denotes the computed aggregate belief score regarding the protection of catching and spreading COVID-19, these are then computed to a single score by averaging across both vectors."
"participants are asked to provide … their belief of acquiring a COVID-19 infection" and later analyses refer to the variable as "subjective risk of acquiring COVID-19".
construct: Perceived risk of acquiring COVID-19 infection

justification: "participants are asked to provide … belief of hospitalisation as a result of a COVID-19 infection," which the authors analyse as "subjective risk of hospitalization from COVID-19".
construct: Perceived risk of hospitalization from COVID-19

measured_by: Self-report intention item / upcoming vaccine appointment question
justification: "Further data on unvaccinated individuals is also collected on vaccine intention and any upcoming vaccine appointments."

measured_by: Self-reported estimate of how many out of 10 people are unvaccinated, partially and fully vaccinated
justification: "Participants are asked to provide subjective judgements of vaccine status distributions (out of 10 people how many are unvaccinated, partially and fully vaccinated)."
construct: Perceived distribution of vaccination statuses in the population
